questions.questionText: In a code language, 'cat eats fish' is 'la ma pa', 'dog eats meat' is 'ta ma ra', and 'cat drinks milk' is 'la sa na'. What is the code for 'eats'?
questions.explanation: 'eats' appears in the first two sentences. The common code word in 'la ma pa' and 'ta ma ra' is 'ma', so 'eats' is coded as 'ma'.
